A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I actually had to change my review on this one. Last Jedi is a bit like a great tasting meal that gives you terrible indigestion. The more I thought about\, the more I realised I just didn't like it. Worse\, I flat out hated it. From Akbars ignominious death to Luke turning into a broken failure ready to betray everything he'd believed in\, it just crashes and burns on so many levels.
